content: peppy rectangle blanket materials yarn any yarn will work i used medium/dk weight for my example blanket crochet hook any hook will work i used a i hook for my example blanket 5 5 mm scissors stitch markers notes i fasten_off each row to change colors video tutorial here and step by step photo tutorial here to keep you rectangle straight flip every row crochet stitches needed chain chain double_crochet stitch double_crochet video tutorial here step by step photo tutorial here picot stitch pi video tutorial here step by step photo tutorial here peppy rectangle blanket pattern chain 20 row 1 single_crochet into 3rd chain from your hook 1 single_crochet into each chain across row 2 chain 3 2 double_crochet into the 1st st *skip 2 sts 3 double_crochet into next st repeat from * until you reach the end of your row make 3 double_crochet into the chs from your last row chain 2 3 double_crochet into that same space *skip 2 sts 3 double_crochet into the next st repeat again from * around slip_stitch into the 1st chs you made in this row to complete row 3 start at any corner space chain 3 2 double_crochet into the corner space chain 3 3 double_crochet into same corner space this is where you would continue like a regular granny stitch row *skip 3 sts chain 1 3 double_crochet into next open space repeat from * for each side until you get to your next corner at any corner 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet into that corner space skip 3 sts chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet into the next corner space repeat the steps for each side now when you reach the end of your row slip_stitch into the 1st chs you made in this row to complete repeat row 3 for however long you want your project like the regular granny stitch work 3 double_crochet into each side open space and 3dc chain 3 3 double_crochet into each corner as you make more row you ll add more spaces to each side to work into border row 1 start at corner space chain 3 2 double_crochet 3 chain pi on top of double_crochet just made 3 more double_crochet into that same space *skip to next open space double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet into that space repeat from * until you reach the next corner space at the corner space 3 double_crochet 3 chain pi on top of double_crochet just made 3 more double_crochet into that same space repeat from * around slip_stitch into the 1st chs you
